CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B03

SHORT_DESCR.P: It is the intention of NWSSP procurement services to provide a three year contract, with the option to extend for 12 months, for plaster room & related items to include (but not exclusive to) the following categories:
— bandage plaster of Paris Roll,
— bandage plaster of Paris Slab,
— cast sandals,
— casting tape fibreglass rigid,
— casting tape non-fibreglass rigid,
— padded synthetic splint rolls.
